title: Spiritual Fair at Lillsjön in Nittorp

text: The Spiritual Fair is an annual event focused on spirituality, personal growth, and holistic health. It's held at Lillsjön's venue in Nittorp, Tranemo Municipality, Västra Götaland, and brings together exhibitors in areas such as healing, tarot, astrology, life coaching, massage, and spiritual guidance. Visitors can book lectures and séances on-site, and there’s also a café and lunch service. The fair is organized by Häxans Hydda, which participates in several spiritual events in the region.
🏷️ Admission prices: 80 SEK per day, 120 SEK for the full weekend. Children under 15 enter free. Tickets are sold at the entrance via Swish.
🕒 Opening hours: Saturday 10:00–17:00 (last lecture/séance at 17:00), Sunday 10:00–16:00 (last lecture/séance at 16:00).
Read more about the event here.
Historical Voices invites you into our world – where echoes of history meet the supernatural. At our booth, you'll have a unique opportunity to:
🎧 Listen to recorded voices from the other side – put on the headphones and hear for yourself what we’ve captured during our investigations.
🎥 Watch slideshows and video clips from our most captivating investigations.
🔍 Handle our equipment – see what we use in the field when searching for answers among whispers and spirits.
📄 Take home our info materials with QR codes, contact details, and everything you need to follow or collaborate with us.
✍️ Help us find our next investigation – suggest places with mysterious energy or unexplained activity.
🍬 Grab a small energy boost – enjoy a candy and stay for a chat.
🪑 Comfortable seating for those who want to hang out and talk with us for a while.

resultTitle: Join us at the Spiritual Fair in Nittorp
more: Read more about the event here
